title: Arkansas House and Boardwalk Cafe
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Restaurant with an organic grocery and gift store inside. Menu, while includes hunted meats, also has vegetarian choices, and staff know what "vegan" means. Vegans could get the country wild rice stir fry, salad, coconut milk ice cream. Uses fresh and local ingredients including produce from owners' garden. Store sells organic baby food, kimchi, and personal care products. Kid friendly, casual atmosphere.
